thread.title: Princeton pulls away from Colgate football in second half
thread.title_full: Princeton pulls away from Colgate football in second half | syracuse.com

author: The Associated Press
title: Princeton pulls away from Colgate football in second half
text:
Princeton, N.J. â€” John Lovett had four rushing touchdowns and Princeton beat Colgate 44-20 on Saturday.
&raquo Box score
Lovett gained 49 yards on 14 carries. Chad Kanoff was 25 of 41 for 277 yards and Isaiah Barnes had eight catches for 92 yards.
Princeton (4-0) led 16-14 at intermission, and then dominated the second half with four long touchdown drives. Lovett scored on a 1-yard plunge in the first quarter, then on runs of 3, 7 and 9 yards in the second half. Joe Rhattigan had a 13-yard scoring run in the second quarter and Charles Volker added a 62-yard romp in the fourth.
Jake Melville went 25 of 42 for 318 yards and a touchdown pass for Colgate (2-4). Demetrius Russell carried 17 times for 68 yards and two touchdowns. Alex Greenawalt had five catches for 92 yards and John Quazza caught seven passes for 88 yards and scored on a 21-yard reception.
